title: Neighborhood Garage Sale - ZIP 48439
description: Hi neighbors! Having a garage sale this weekend. Kids toys, books, clothes, kitchen items, and some furniture. Everything priced to sell. Come browse and say hello!

title: Moving Sale - ZIP 48439
description: We're moving across the country and need to downsize! Quality furniture, appliances, electronics, home decor, and more. Serious buyers welcome. Cash preferred.
